data.title: Going Downhill Fast
data.text: Wendy's used to be my favorite fast food source of burgers.  I don't know what they've done but the hot and juicy isn't hot and juicy anymore.  Lately the burgers seem to have some sort of glaze or coating of some sort that is totally unappealing.  As for price, I can get a fresh meat burger just down the road for very near the same price.  Wendy's has seen the last of me.

data.title: ok food
data.text: fast food its ok better than McDonalds and Burger King Wendy's hamburgers and fries a great my opinion compared to other fast food ther faster but I'd rather go to at Golden Corral
